text: (upbeat music)
- My name is Ryan King,

and I'm a software
development manager with
AWS Managed Services.

I've been at AWS for about
eight and a half years,
coming up on nine here.
I started my journey

in AWS Premium Support
as a support engineer,

working with customers
to help answer their
"How do I do this?" question.

Most motivating thing for
me about staying at AWS

is the laser sharp focus
on working backwards
from the customer.
Being able to come to work every day
and work to solve customer problems.
As well as, I get to work with
some really cool, smart people.

I think one of the strongest
reasons to consider AWS is

its real strong customer
focus, working backwards from
their needs.
Autonomy to make decisions.
We strive to empower our teams to
make independent decisions.

It's a place where you can
show up every day and create.
(upbeat music)
Outside of work,

I'm involved in our
Inclusion Ambassador chapter,

to help ensure that we
strengthen our practices

around inclusion and
diversity so that we can
welcome a diverse candidate pool to
show up and do really impactful things.
(upbeat music)
